title: RMI (Remote Method Invocation) fromework for Java built-in SDP
summary: RMI (Remote Method Invocation) framework supporting service discovery out-of-box among devices within same network considering  IOT(internet of device) proof-of-concept project
description: A year since 2017, I was responsible for taking development owership of out-sourced project which had been lousily maintained almost 2 years, so I struggled hard to find out how the unmanageble code could be refactored into manageable and extensible code. so I started to have an interest in meta programming support in Java. I started this project for learning experience of meta programming in Java.
